Class Tv

public class Tv
extends java.lang.Object

a small class for some manipulations

Version:
1.0
Author:

Constructor Summary
Tv()
          Builds a Tv, initially it is off, ready for channel 5 and sound volume is 3 for a max level of 10.
 
Method Summary
 void changeChannel(int channelNum)
          change current channel if this Tv is on
 int currentChannel()
          returns the current channel
 void displayState()
          display this tv current information
 void off()
          turn this tv off
 void on()
          turn this tv on
 java.lang.String toString()
          provide a string representation for this Tv object
 void volumeDown()
          increase sound level if tv is on, sound level can not be negative
 void volumeUp()
          increase sound level if on, sound level can not be greater than max level
